Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}, request_id=9a46955f-6e9c-4403-8036-86a6bc5f5a5d}

1. 技术教程建议2000-3000字，确保内容详实
2. 心得体会控制在1000-2000字，保持精炼
3. 新闻资讯800-1500字，突出重点
4. 当前最受欢迎的是短文(1000字以下)的文章，可以多尝试这个长度","读者在0:00-1:00活跃度最高，建议在此时间段发布文章或与读者互动","建议及时回复读者评论，提高读者互动积极性"]}},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}, request_id=a241c2ca-9d7b-4a46-a7dc-188b2fe97e79}

4. 当前最受欢迎的是短文(1000字以下)的文章，可以多尝试这个长度","读者在0:00-1:00活跃度最高，建议在此时间段发布文章或与读者互动","建议及时回复读者评论，提高读者互动积极性"]}},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:30:20.582478600Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"de $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:30:58.738066300Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:34:42.464094900Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}, request_id=0faf8cca-ffa5-43fb-a648-8965b82e7d83}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}, request_id=ab07839d-ffdf-4bd5-b4a1-a38e0864cb5a}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCodeValue":200,"statusCode":"OK"}, request_id=28a87e3e-cc1f-4951-9862-00136d9740cc}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/post/analytics/public/author, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:35:23.492671400Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"success","data":{"authorId":2,"userBehavior":{"activityDistribution":{"REPLY":2,"FAVORITE":2,"COMMENT":2,"LIKE":1,"LIKE_COMMENT":4},"avgInteractionTime":200.73,"topEngagers":[2],"topEngagerNames":["kitty"]},"writingSuggestions":["建议在 00:00-01:00 发布文章，这个时间段的平均互动率最高（28.21%）","建议标题长度保持在8个字左右，这个长度的互动率较高","您平均每4.5天发布一篇文章，保持稳定的更新频率有助于维持读者粘性","文章《第二篇博客》的互动率最高（77.78%），建议参考其写作风格和主题","数据显示短文(1000字以下)的文章互动率最高（29.70%），建议：
1. 技术教程建议2000-3000字，确保内容详实
2. 心得体会控制在1000-2000字，保持精炼
3. 新闻资讯800-1500字，突出重点

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:43:35.896667400Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=c38f6d79-85d1-4aa6-8c25-0c860532f1ba}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/admin/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:44:11.568399Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation scription":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=6412d91b-088a-46d7-894a-24753666d408}

scription":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=74e19191-6f22-4092-ae05-5b75f719b635}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=2b405539-a5bb-41a1-898d-0b9a33c513f6}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=a888c094-9c7a-47c0-99ac-0e92de495fb1}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=71eb9b09-124c-4040-9a34-8fd9a383b95e}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/admin/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:48:56.718940600Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=90ebe2cc-f6e1-46b5-91f3-bb8c820ead7b}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=bc588c2d-36ef-4348-96bc-a678b0daf976}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=36e80707-0f9a-44fa-8af9-8ee8b5ed2266}

ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/post/favorite/public/find/folder/%E9%BB%98%E8%AE%A4%E6%94%B6%E8%97%8F%E5%A4%B9, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:52:13.959671400Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":[{"post":{"postId":2,"userId":2,"title":"第二篇博客","abstractContent":" 嗯，我最近在学习编程，发现有时候写代码的时候会遇到一些小问题，比如语法错误或者是逻辑上的疏忽。有时候我会觉得特别困惑，不知道该从哪里开始解决。这时候，我就会想到去网上找些资源或者教程来帮助自己。不过，我发现有些时候网络上提供的信息可能不太全面，或者解释得不够清楚，导致我仍然无法解决问题。于是，我想到了这个“编程互助”这个概念，希望能够找到一种更有效的方式来帮助我解决编程中的难题。 有一次，我在写一个函数的时候遇到了一个问题，但总是出错，不知道为什么。我尝试在网上查找资料，但是没有找到合适的解决方案。于是，我就想到了在这个编程互助的社区里寻求帮助。我发了一篇帖子，描述了我的问题，并附上了我的代码。没想到，很快就有人回复了，他们不仅指出了我代码中的错误，还给出了修改后的代码。这让我感到非常高兴，因为我终于解决了这个问题。从那以后，我就经常在这个社区里提问和分享经验，感觉受益匪浅。 不过，我也注意到有时候有些问题并没有得到及时的帮助，甚至有些回复并不准确。有时候，我也会担心自己的隐私会不会被泄露，毕竟我在网上和陌生人交流。所以，我觉得需要更多的安全措施来保护自己的个人信息。 ","content":"你好，这是一个互动博客","createdAt":"2025-03-20","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":5,"favorites":1,"coverImage":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/posts/2/1744204791136-tmp4664492870873539452-IMG_6476.JPG","version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"favoriteId":1,"folderName":"默认收藏夹"},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"favoriteId":6,"folderName":"默认收藏夹"}],"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=ed4e4096-8813-49e9-a7aa-bd0497b9d5ce}

当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"favoriteId":6,"folderName":"默认收藏夹"}],"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=ef4b4773-87a3-4880-bcdc-020a14d34361}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=b4b6cf08-1796-40b1-aee1-4663f5e56114}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation
