ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=e5d983b5-e289-4ae3-a357-2a7ea7eb5ae5}

1. 技术教程建议2000-3000字，确保内容详实
2. 心得体会控制在1000-2000字，保持精炼
3. 新闻资讯800-1500字，突出重点

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T10:58:05.173230300Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=b2c77119-ced5-4856-a28f-2178c60f56af}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"de $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=65e394c1-77d3-4653-894b-dca0cf2dd8ba}

ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T11:04:29.995453100Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=733948ce-362d-4f2a-b1ae-3d97b27410f5}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T11:04:39.472130600Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 {"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=2b4bc931-be1a-4b53-a518-627241e9b4c8}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

API Response: {phase=response, log_type=api-metrics, endpoint=/api/stat/public/dashboard/recent-posts, environment=dev, @timestamp=2025-04-25T11:05:10.130804400Z, http_method=GET, application=blog-system, success=true, service=blog-system, host=DESKTOP-OSJO1O2, response_body={"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=05c0e8d8-7752-486c-9658-fc72cac7a68a}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=68ac6e9e-b6a2-46a5-9482-8c204a114126}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=e4a15707-d470-4524-be83-dfa056f8fffe}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=e97422dd-a148-4d3f-9c63-fc7f07adbf5b}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=174a53e8-ebe5-41b5-95f9-cdd657176901}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=eabb98b1-9669-40a9-a7b9-8f25719b93b3}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation ion":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":7,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030064391-tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp2725684952046291601-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:47:44","size":null},{"attachmentId":8,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030100898-tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentName":"tmp12416319274954349252-01.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:21","size":null},{"attachmentId":9,"postId":14,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/14/1744030112185-tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp1679700868521692453-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:48:32","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":13,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":"正在编辑......","content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-16","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":0,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":6,"postId":13,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/13/1744029857569-tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp6472320869495803875-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:44:17","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":12,"userId":2,"title":"未命名文章","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑...","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-24","isPublished":false,"isDraft":false,"views":1,"likes":0,"favorites":0,"coverImage":null,"version":1,"visibility":"PRIVATE","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":null,"name":null,"description":null,"parentCategoryId":null,"useCount":0},"tags":[],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":5,"postId":12,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/12/1744029726420-tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4797937238183366197-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:42:06","size":null}]},{"post":{"postId":11,"userId":2,"title":"方差公式","abstractContent":null,"content":"正在编辑... $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=ceebb7db-24fc-4cc1-8aa8-eff05b985250}

Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 {"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation $$ \sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \mu)^2} $$ 问题出在 `selectedVersion` 和下拉选项值的比较上。Element Plus 的 `el-select` 组件在比较选项值时使用的是严格相等（`===`），而你的版本数据可能在不同时间获取时创建了新的对象引用，导致比较失败。 以下是解决方案： 1. **使用版本ID作为选项值**：修改 `el-select` 和 `el-option` 使用 `versionId` 作为值，而不是整个对象 2. **添加自定义比较逻辑**：使用 `value-key` 属性指定比较的键 修改后的代码： ```vue ``` 关键修改点： 1. 添加了 `value-key="versionId"` 属性，告诉 `el-select` 使用 `versionId` 来比较选项 2. 确保 `selectedVersion` 始终是 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果问题仍然存在，可以尝试以下调试方法： 1. 在模板中添加调试信息： ```html
当前选中: {{ selectedVersion?.version }} (ID: {{ selectedVersion?.versionId }})
版本列表: {{ versions.map(v => v.version) }}
``` 2. 检查 `selectedVersion` 和 `versions` 中的对象是否具有相同的 `versionId` 但不同的引用 3. 确保在 `loadVersions` 和 `handleCreateVersion` 等方法中，更新 `selectedVersion` 时总是使用 `versions` 数组中的引用，而不是新创建的对象 如果还是有问题，可能需要检查后端返回的数据结构是否一致，或者提供更详细的调试信息。","createdAt":"2025-04-07","updatedAt":"2025-04-23","isPublished":true,"isDraft":false,"views":9,"likes":0,"favorites":1,"coverImage":null,"version":2,"visibility":"PUBLIC","deleted":false},"category":{"categoryId":1,"name":"C++","description":"C++模块","parentCategoryId":0,"useCount":2},"tags":[{"tagId":1,"name":"开发","useCount":15,"clickCount":0,"lastUsedAt":"2025-04-13T10:25:35.559083","weight":35,"adminWeight":5}],"comments":[],"author":"kitty","attachments":[{"attachmentId":4,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744029608020-tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentName":"tmp4304496941237729176-2.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-07T20:40:08","size":null},{"attachmentId":17,"postId":11,"url":"https://hello-kitty-cat-sweet.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/images/post/11/1744526759956-tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentName":"tmp964781067902368300-image.png","attachmentType":"image/png","createdTime":"2025-04-13T14:46:01","size":191157}]}]},"statusCode":"OK","statusCodeValue":200}, request_id=91512f34-df33-4fbb-941e-b92eefc516d4}

{"headers":{},"body":{"status":200,"message":"获取成功","data":[{"post":{"postId":16,"userId":2,"title":"解决content过长带来的问题","abstractContent":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content:...","content":"The error occurs because the content column in the database is too small to store the provided content. Let's modify the content field in the Post entity to use @Lob annotation for large text content: ```java @Column(nullable = false) @Lob @Column(columnDefinition = "LONGTEXT") private String content; ``` This change will: 1. Use @Lob to indicate this is a Large Object 2. Set the column type to LONGTEXT in MySQL which can store up to 4GB of text 3. Prevent the data truncation error when saving large content You'll need to update your database schema accordingly. You can use this SQL: ```sql ALTER TABLE fs_posts MODIFY COLUMN content LONGTEXT; ``` This will allow you to store large amounts of text content in your blog posts without truncation
